page: EE49004: Power Apparatus And System Design

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Design of electrical Transmission System for transmitting bulk amount of power. Design considerations for DC or AC transmission. Design of rural and urban distribution systems and design of electrical substation. Power System Grounding Design. Lightning
